snippet: The measure gives unlicensed motorists time to find a legal driver and avoid impound. To get the car released, the unlicensed driver also must get the registered owner’s approval.
lead_paragraph: The measure gives unlicensed motorists time to find a legal driver and avoid impound. To get the car released, the unlicensed driver also must get the registered owner’s approval.

headline.main: Law Intends to Cut Down on Vehicles Impounded
headline.seo: California Law Intends to Reduce Number of Impounded Vehicles
headline.print_headline: Law Intends To Cut Down On Vehicles Impounded
